marketplaces.repo_description: Claude Code skills marketplace for Harley Systems tools

files.README.md:
# Claude Skills - Harley Systems

Claude Code skills marketplace for Harley Systems tools.

## Installation

```
/plugin marketplace add harley-systems/claude-skills
```

Then use `/plugin` to install individual skills.

## Available Skills

### sca-plugin

SCA (Simple Certificate Authority) CLI assistant. Provides command reference, YubiKey/PKCS#11 integration docs, workflow guides, and development documentation for the [SCA](https://github.com/harley-systems/sca) tool.

### openwrt-plugin

Ansible collection [harley.openwrt](https://github.com/harley-systems/ansible-collection-openwrt) assistant. Covers all 10 roles (base, network, firewall, dhcp_dns, ipsec, ipsec_gateway, acme, ddns, ddns_gateway, webui), the UCI module, inventory conventions, playbook patterns, and troubleshooting for OpenWRT router and Linux gateway configuration via Ansible.

plugins.name: sca-plugin
plugins.description: SCA (Simple Certificate Authority) CLI assistant. Use when the user needs to manage PKI certificates, create keys, CSRs, or certificates, configure SCA, manage YubiKey hardware tokens, approve signing requests, export certificate bundles, or perform any certificate authority operations using the sca command-line tool.

plugins.name: openwrt-plugin
plugins.description: Ansible collection harley.openwrt assistant. Use when the user needs to configure OpenWRT routers or Linux gateways using Ansible, create playbooks with harley.openwrt roles (base, network, firewall, dhcp_dns, ipsec, ipsec_gateway, acme, ddns, ddns_gateway, webui), manage UCI configuration, set up StrongSwan VPN, ACME certificates, DHCP/DNS, dynamic DNS, firewall zones, WiFi, or troubleshoot OpenWRT Ansible deployments.
